column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////The breakfast I ordered on the first visit - the Bliss Berry crepes - was amazing .  They were moist and tasty!  The second visit
column2: I stuck to a lunch item
column3: the tuna wrap.  The tuna was not a very high quality
column4: which wasn't surprising given that this is a diner-type restaurant and is affordable.  Next time I'll stick to a breakfast-lunch!  Service is attentive - you can be in and out in 45 minutes with a sit-down lunch
column5: and they're fast on the soda refills.  I highly recommend Wildberry for an inexpensive meal with a large
column6: diverse menu of items to choose from.
